# Changelog

## [0.1.0] - 2025-02-27

### Features

- Initial release of Cokra - AI Agent Team CLI Environment
- Architecture inspired by OpenAI Codex
- Project skeleton with Bazel, Rust, and Node.js toolchain
- Configuration files and build system setup

### Technical

- Apache License 2.0
- Rust 2024 Edition
- Bazel 9.0.0 build system
- PNPM workspace for Node.js packages
- Just command runner
